---
title: PlistApi.plist_set_string_val method
---

Set the value of a node. Forces type of node to #PLIST_STRING

```csharp
public virtual void plist_set_string_val(PlistHandle node, string val)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| node | the node |
| val | the string value. The string is copied when set and will be freed by the node. |
